name: Ninja Jesus
description:
To the extent possible under law, the person who associated CC0 with this work has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this work.

Ninja Jesus is a small game created for the Public Domain Jam by Moxyle.

This game is published under a CC0 so every single asset is available for use by anybody. So feel free to dissect all of my code and use all of my assets.

Thanks for playing.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to attack

Left Click when you have complete Belief to use God's Hand

Esc to Quit the game

Attacking uses up your Stamina

Getting hit by Sins increases you Sin

When your Sin hits 100, you loose the level reloads

Destroying Sins increases belief

Try to survive as long as you can

Sorry about the lack of art. I didn't have time.
